page.title: 12COMMERCE AND INDUSTRY
page.content: The{commerce}within this area reflects the multicultural society which lives here. The Pear Tree and Normanton Road areas are the centres of the Asian and West Indian community. Numerous shops selling exotic foods and clothing, mangoes, sarih etc. have sprung up to cater for population needs. {Heavy engineering}including foundry work takes place in the south-east of the area including Ley's Castings and Ewart Chains, both of which have an international market. To the north-east is part of Derby's multi-million pound Eagle shopping centre containing all the major department stores - Woolworths, Boots the chemist and clothing shops such as C and A together with specialist shops selling motorcycles and accessories.
